==Events==
* [[927]] &ndash; [[Æthelstan]], [[List of English monarchs|King of England]], secures a pledge from [[Constantine II of Scotland|Constantine&nbsp;II of Scotland]] that the latter will not ally with [[Viking]] kings, beginning the process of unifying [[Great Britain]]. This is considered the closest thing that [[England]] has to a foundation date.
*[[1191]] &ndash; [[Third Crusade]]: [[Saladin]]'s garrison surrenders to [[Philip II of France|Philip Augustus]], ending the two-year [[siege of Acre (1189–1191)|siege of Acre]].
*[[1470]] &ndash; The [[Ottoman Empire|Ottomans]] capture [[Euboea]].
*[[1493]] &ndash; [[Hartmann Schedel]]'s ''[[Nuremberg Chronicle]]'', one of the best-documented early printed books, is published.
*[[1543]] &ndash; King [[Henry VIII of England]] marries his sixth and last wife, [[Catherine Parr]], at [[Hampton Court Palace]].
*[[1561]] &ndash; [[Saint Basil's Cathedral]] in [[Moscow]] is consecrated.
*[[1562]] &ndash; Fray [[Diego de Landa]], acting [[Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Yucatán|Bishop of Yucatán]], burns the sacred books of the [[Maya civilization|Maya]].
*[[1580]] &ndash; The [[Ostrog Bible]], one of the early printed [[Bible]]s in a [[Slavic languages|Slavic language]], is published.
*[[1690]] &ndash; [[Battle of the Boyne]] ([[Gregorian calendar]]) &ndash; The armies of [[William III of England|William III]] defeat those of the former [[James II of England|James II]].
*[[1691]] &ndash; [[Battle of Aughrim]] ([[Julian calendar]]) &ndash; The decisive victory of [[William III of England]]'s forces in [[Ireland]].
*[[1776]] &ndash; Captain [[James Cook]] begins his [[Third voyage of James Cook|third voyage]].
*[[1789]] &ndash; French revolutionary and radical journalist [[Camille Desmoulins]] gave a speech in response to the dismissal of [[Jacques Necker]] France's finance minister the day before. The speech calls the citizens to arms and leads to the [[Storming of the Bastille]] two days later.
*[[1790]] &ndash; The [[Civil Constitution of the Clergy]] is passed in [[France]] by the [[National Constituent Assembly]].
*[[1799]] &ndash; [[Ranjit Singh]] conquers Lahore and becomes Maharaja of The Punjab ([[Sikh Empire]]) .
*[[1801]] &ndash; [[French Revolutionary Wars]]: British [[Royal Navy]] ships inflict heavy damage against Spanish and French ships in the [[Second Battle of Algeciras]].
*[[1804]] &ndash; Former [[United States Secretary of the Treasury]] [[Alexander Hamilton]] dies a day after being shot in a [[Burr–Hamilton duel|duel]].
*[[1806]] &ndash; Sixteen [[Germany|German]] [[Imperial State|imperial states]] leave the [[Holy Roman Empire]] and form the [[Confederation of the Rhine]].
*  1806   &ndash; [[Liechtenstein]] is given full sovereignty after its accession to the [[Confederation of the Rhine]].
*[[1812]] &ndash; [[War of 1812]]: the [[United States]] invades [[Canada]] at [[Windsor, Ontario]].
*[[1862]] &ndash; The [[Medal of Honor]] is authorized by the [[United States Congress]].
*[[1879]] &ndash; The [[National Guards Unit of Bulgaria]] is founded.
*[[1913]] &ndash; [[Second Balkan War]]: [[Kingdom of Serbia|Serbian]] forces begin their [[Siege of Vidin (1913)|siege]] of the [[Kingdom of Bulgaria|Bulgarian]] city of [[Vidin]]; the siege is later called off when the war ends.
*[[1917]] &ndash; The [[Bisbee Deportation]] occurs as [[vigilante]]s [[kidnapping|kidnap]] and [[deportation|deport]] nearly 1,300 [[strike action|striking]] miners and others from [[Bisbee, Arizona]].
*[[1918]] &ndash; The [[Imperial Japanese Navy]] battleship ''[[Japanese battleship Kawachi|Kawachi]]'' blows up at [[Yamaguchi Prefecture|Shunan]], western [[Honshu]], [[Japan]], killing at least 621.
*[[1920]] &ndash; The [[Soviet–Lithuanian Peace Treaty]] is signed. [[Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic|Soviet Russia]] recognizes independent [[Lithuania]].
*[[1932]] &ndash; [[Hedley Verity]] takes a [[cricket]] [[Hedley Verity#World record|world record]] 10 wickets for 10 runs in a [[County Championship|county]] match for [[Yorkshire County Cricket Club|Yorkshire]]
*[[1943]] &ndash; [[World War II]]: [[Battle of Prokhorovka]] &ndash; [[Nazi Germany|German]] and [[Soviet Union|Soviet]] forces engage in one of the largest [[tank]] engagements of all time.
*[[1948]] &ndash; [[1948 Arab–Israeli War|Arab–Israeli War]]: Israeli Prime Minister [[David Ben-Gurion]] orders the [[1948 Palestinian exodus from Lydda and Ramle|expulsion of Palestinians]] from the towns of [[Lod]] and [[Ramla]].
*[[1960]] &ndash; [[Orlyonok]], the main [[Young Pioneer camp]] of the [[Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic|Russian SFSR]], is founded.
*[[1961]] &ndash; [[Pune]] floods due to failure of the [[Khadakwasla Dam|Khadakwasla]] and [[Panshet Dam|Panshet]] dams. Half of Pune is submerged, more than 100,000 families need to be relocated and the death toll exceeds 2,000.
*[[1962]] &ndash; [[The Rolling Stones]] perform their first concert, at the [[Marquee Club]] in [[London|London, England, United Kingdom]].
*[[1963]] &ndash; 16-year-old Pauline Reade disappears on her way to a dance at the British Railways Club in [[Gorton]], England, the first victim in the [[Moors murders]].
*[[1967]] &ndash; The [[1967 Newark riots|Newark riots]] begin in [[Newark, New Jersey]].
*[[1970]] &ndash; A fire consumes the wooden home of Norwegian composer [[Geirr Tveitt]] and irretrievably destroys about 90 percent of his output.
*[[1971]] &ndash; The [[Australian Aboriginal Flag]] is flown for the first time.
*[[1973]] &ndash; A [[National Personnel Records Center fire|fire]] destroys the entire 6th floor of the [[National Personnel Records Center]] of the United States.
*[[1975]] &ndash; [[São Tomé and Príncipe]] declare independence from [[Portugal]].
*[[1979]] &ndash; The island nation of [[Kiribati]] becomes independent from [[United Kingdom]].
*[[2006]] &ndash; [[Hezbollah]] initiates [[2006 Lebanon War|Operation True Promise]].
*[[2007]] &ndash; [[United States Army|U.S. Army]] [[Boeing AH-64 Apache|Apache helicopters]] perform [[July 12, 2007 Baghdad airstrike|airstrikes]] in [[Baghdad]], [[Iraq]]; footage from the cockpit is later leaked to the Internet.
*[[2012]] &ndash; A [[Okogbe tank truck explosion|tank truck explosion]] kills more than 100 people in [[Okobie]], [[Nigeria]].
*  2012   &ndash; The [[Turaymisah killings|Turaymisah massacre]] kills 250 people during a [[Syrian]] military operation in a village within the [[Hama Governorate]].
*[[2013]] &ndash; 6 people are killed and 200 injured in a passenger train [[Brétigny-sur-Orge train crash|derailment]] in [[Brétigny-sur-Orge]], [[France]].
